title: List cards details from current site
description: This action lists requested cards details from current site for shopper profile. On invocation of this action, saved cards (profileRepository.savedCards.<profileId>.savedCardsMap) will get updated with retrieved cards and current site specific saved cards ids (profileRepository.savedCards.<profileId>.currentSiteSavedCardIds) will get replaced in application state.

allCards.description: This value is set to true, if inactive cards are also expected in the response.
